content:
University Dance Department Chair Michelle Heffner Hayes coedited a recently released book  that clears up misconceptions about flamenco dance according to aUniversity news release PERIOD

The book debunks stereotypes about flamenco dance and connects the traditional Spanish dance to other diverse areas of research according to the release PERIOD

Hayes said in the release that people make assumptions about flamenco dance but there isnt much to support it PERIOD

Hayes coedited the book alongside two other people K PERIOD Meira Goldberg an instructor at the Fashion Institute of Technology and Ninotchka Devorah Benham a professor at the University of California Santa Barbara according to the press release PERIOD



 Edited by Michael Portman

title: KU dance department chair taps away myths about Flamenco dance in new book | Arts & Culture | kansan.com
name: University of Kansas
